item.title: 对 DeepSeek 的担忧挥之不去，英伟达股价不再坚挺
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的投资者通常会在股价下跌时抢购该股。但自从 DeepSeek 引发的溃败以来，投资者的情绪就不一样了，这表明对人工智能支出放缓的担忧并没有消失。【原文：Nvidia Corp. investors have typically rushed to buy the stock on any dips. But the mood since the DeepSeek-driven rout has been different, signaling that fears of a slowdown in AI spending aren’t going away.】

item.title: 努力挽救风险投资减税已成为一种熟悉而又令人紧张的仪式
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，萨拉-麦克布赖德（Sarah McBride）撰文报道了风险投资公司准备再次争夺结转利息免税额的努力。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Sarah McBride writes about the effort by venture capital firms to prepare for another fight over the carried interest tax exemption.】

item.title: 印度监管机构解除对亿万富翁支持的科塔克银行的限制
item.description: 印度银行业监管机构在近 10 个月后取消了对科塔克-马恒达银行有限公司（Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. ）的限制，在此期间，该银行的利润率不断缩水。【原文：India’s banking regulator has lifted restrictions on Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. after nearly 10 months, which saw the lender’s margins shrinking during the period.】

item.title: 美国公司像 2007 年一样开拓欧洲廉价债券市场
item.description: 美国蓝筹股公司正以极快的速度举借欧元债务，以锁定大洋彼岸较低的借贷成本。【原文：Blue-chip US companies are raising euro debt at breakneck speed in a bid to lock in significantly lower borrowing costs across the pond.】

item.title: 风险投资人布拉德利-图斯克转向为初创企业提供建议— 而非现金
item.description:
这位投资人曾是优步（Uber）公司的顾问，如今他正放弃传统的风险投资模式，回归政治本源。【原文：

Once an Uber adviser, the investor is ditching the traditional VC model and returning to his political roots.

】

item.description:

item.title: 阿根廷准备加深航道以实现更多贸易
item.description: 阿根廷正着手升级其被忽视的农作物出口水道，以阻止邻国巴西作为南美粮食供应强国建立不可逾越的领先优势。【原文：Argentina is moving to upgrade its neglected waterway for crop exports in a bid to stop neighbor Brazil from building an insurmountable lead as South America’s powerhouse food supplier.】

item.title: Nordnet 交易保障措施失灵受到金融服务管理局的重视
item.description: 瑞典数字银行 Nordnet AB 证实，一名客户周二进入了另一名客户的账户，并启动了股票交易。【原文：Swedish digital bank Nordnet AB has confirmed that a client who gained access to another customer’s account on Tuesday was able to initiate an equities trade.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德的信贷部门现已成为其最大的资产来源
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）在第四季度筹集了 290 亿美元，其中大部分是通过信贷业务筹集的，信贷业务已成为该公司最大的增长动力。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management raised $29 billion in the fourth quarter, most of it through its credit business, which has become its largest driver of growth.】

item.title: 欧洲央行埃尔德森称数据比中性政策更重要
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员弗兰克-埃尔德森（Frank Elderson）表示，对于制定货币政策而言，即将公布的经济数据比中性利率更为重要。【原文：European Central Bank Executive Board member Frank Elderson said that incoming economic data is more important for setting monetary policy than the neutral rate of interest.】

item.title: 米莱促进农产品出口的计划：阻止船只搁浅
item.description: 要想了解阿根廷在竞争中的艰难处境，不妨看看奥斯陆汉莎号的困境。【原文：To understand Argentina’s struggle to be competitive, consider the plight of the Hansa Oslo.】

item.title: 收购巨头面临特朗普的早期考验，从关税到税收
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫是美国交易商的净赢家，但私募股权公司正面临着这一理论的早期考验。【原文：Private equity firms are facing early tests to the theory that Donald Trump’s return to the White House is a net win for America’s dealmakers.】

item.title: Neuralink 的竞争对手与沙特阿拉伯的 Neom 公司合作开发大脑技术
item.description: Paradromics 公司是埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 Neuralink 公司的大脑植入竞争对手，该公司正与沙特阿拉伯的 Neom 公司合作，在中东和北非开发脑机接口疗法。【原文：Paradromics Inc., a brain implant rival to Elon Musk’s Neuralink Corp., is partnering with Saudi Arabia’s Neom to develop brain-computer interface therapies in the Middle East and North Africa.】

item.title: 出人意料的盈利增长未能提振股市
item.description: 在经济强劲增长的支持下，美国公司正迎来三年来最好的盈利季节之一。尽管如此，对关税的担忧、仍然居高不下的利率和高估值，使标准普尔 500 指数在过去几周一直处于中性水平。【原文：US companies are putting up one of their best earnings seasons in three years on the back of robust economic growth. Still, concern about tariffs, still-high interest rates and lofty valuations have kept the S&P 500 stuck in neutral for the past few weeks.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴飙升 870 亿美元，成为中国人工智能新宠儿
item.description: 对中国人工智能的狂热正使阿里巴巴集团再次成为投资者的宠儿，为这家在长达数年的监管打压后几乎销声匿迹的电子商务巨头注入了新的活力。【原文：The frenzy over Chinese artificial intelligence is turning Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. into an investor favorite again, injecting new life into an e-commerce giant that had nearly sunk into obscurity following a years-long regulatory crackdown.】

item.title: 雷诺是日产未来的关键，鸿海正在考虑迁移
item.description: 随着 iPhone 制造商富士康与濒临破产的日本汽车制造商日产汽车公司周旋，雷诺汽车公司将在达成的任何交易中发挥决定性作用。【原文：As iPhone maker Foxconn circles the ailing Japanese automaker Nissan Motor Co., Renault SA will play a decisive role in any deal that’s struck.】

item.title: 欧洲住房完工量将降至十年最低水平
item.description: 由于融资和材料成本上升继续抑制整个欧洲大陆的建筑活动，预计今年欧洲新建公寓数量将降至2015年以来的最低水平。【原文：The number of newly built apartments in Europe is expected to drop this year to its lowest level since 2015 as higher financing and material costs continue to dampen construction activity across the continent.】

item.title: 炙手可热的通胀印记将破坏 S&P 500 指数创纪录的上涨势头
item.description: 由于关税和人工智能前景不明朗，美股涨势已经摇摇欲坠。如果再加上通胀数据炙手可热，市场就会出现抛售。【原文：The US stock rally is already on shaky ground due to tariffs and an uncertain outlook about artificial intelligence. Add a hot inflation print to the mix, and the market will sell off.】

item.title: 印度一月份通胀缓解，证明印度央行降息是合理的
item.description: 印度的通胀率在 1 月份降至 5 个月来的最低点，为央行降息提供了理由，但在货币贬值和关税威胁下，风险依然存在。【原文：India’s inflation eased to a five-month low in January, justifying the central bank interest rate cut, though risks remain amid a depreciating currency and threat of tariffs.】

item.title: 阿达尼为澳大利亚煤炭港签署 2.07 亿美元私人贷款协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度企业集团阿达尼集团（Adani Group）已为其位于澳大利亚昆士兰州北部的煤炭港口部门签署了一项约 3.3 亿澳元（2.07 亿美元）的私人信用贷款。【原文：Indian conglomerate Adani Group has signed an around A$330 million ($207 million) private credit loan for its coal port unit located in Australia’s Northern Queensland, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普关税言论让股价下跌的买家迷恋周三
item.description: 2025 年迄今为止，投资者可以依靠一周中的一个重要日子为 S&P 500 指数提供强劲的跌势买入机会：星期三。【原文：Investors can rely on one crucial day of the week to deliver strong dip-buying opportunities for the S&P 500 Index thus far in 2025: Wednesdays.】

item.title: 霍尔茨曼告诉 CNBC，欧洲央行今年不应减息半点
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）对 CNBC 表示，欧洲中央银行不应该加大降息力度来提振该地区疲软的经济。【原文：The European Central Bank shouldn’t increase the size of its interest-rate cuts to perk up the region’s flagging economy, Governing Council member Robert Holzmann told CNBC.】

item.title: 中东炼糖厂因利润薄而减少产量
item.description: 世界上最大的港口炼糖厂--迪拜哈利杰糖业公司（Al Khaleej Sugar Co.【原文：Sugar refineries in the Middle East are running below capacity because of lower profitability, according to the head of Dubai’s Al Khaleej Sugar Co., owner of the world’s largest port-based sugar refinery.】

item.title: 印度食糖 "丰收"，下季允许出口
item.description: 据一位政府官员称，由于有利的天气条件有助于农民增加种植面积，印度预计下一榨季将有足够的糖用于出口。【原文：India expects to have enough sugar for export next season as favorable weather conditions help farmers boost acreage, according to a government official.】

item.title: 能源管理公司 E2 将通过 SPAC 以 5 亿美元的价值上市
item.description: 能源管理公司 e2Companies LLC 受人工智能电力需求和电网压力的推动，正在通过一家由石油天然气钻井承包商纳博斯工业有限公司（Nabors Industries Ltd.）支持的空白支票公司上市。【原文：Energy management firm e2Companies LLC, propelled by AI’s power demands and a stressed electrical grid, is going public through a blank-check company backed by oil and gas drilling contractor Nabors Industries Ltd.】

item.title: 五角大楼合同机构称 RTX 仍在努力交付海军顶级导弹拦截器
item.description: 五角大楼的合同管理机构称，RTX 公司仍在努力生产美国海军的顶级防空导弹，以对抗被称为 "航母杀手 "的中国武器。【原文：RTX Corp. is still struggling to produce the US Navy’s top air-defense missile, needed to counter a Chinese weapon known as its “aircraft carrier killer,” the Pentagon’s contract management agency says.】

item.title: 在一系列创纪录的欧洲债券销售之后，下一个将是法国
item.description: 法国将在公开银团债务市场上延续欧洲有史以来最繁忙的一年开局，因为投资者们看淡了该国的财政和政治挑战，锁定了接近一年多来最高的收益率。【原文：France is set to extend Europe’s busiest start to a year on record in the publicly syndicated debt market as investors look past the country’s fiscal and political challenges to lock in yields near the highest in more than a year.】

item.title: Orcel 称联合信贷银行未与法国农业信贷银行就 BPM 进行谈判
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 表示，他不会与法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）就竞购 Banco BPM SpA 事宜举行任何现场会谈。【原文：UniCredit SpA Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel said he’s not holding any live talks with Credit Agricole SA to discuss his bid for Banco BPM SpA.】
